will beam form on that person and we'll take that signal and we'll run it through a wake word engine and we'll
send that wake word at the same time up to the cloud will say did the person say Alexa and if they did we'll turn on the
microphones and then begin to record a signal that we then send to our ASR so
the automatic speech recognition engine it converts it from speech to text it then figures out okay what's the natural
language command or intent that's happening here what are they what's the person trying to do and we determine in
this case that someone's trying to get the weather so we know what the intent is they're trying to get the weather and
so we pass it to the domain skill or the intent engine that figures out what that
response is so it figures out where is this device this device is in Mumbai India and so it says okay the person is
